title: Bagels and Beans - IJDok
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Dutch-owned chain of lunchroom offering a menu inspired not by American-style bagels but the tastes and herbs of Southern France. Offers vegetarian and vegan bagels, sweets, coffees and fresh juices - made largely with fair-trade and organic ingredients. Could replace cream cheese with hummus for most menu items, has vegan tuna from der Vegetarische Slager clearly advertised on a separate page in the menu. Free Wi-Fi and views over the river.
